snippet: Pope Francis reaffirmed a plan to have three bishops supervise an overhaul of the nation’s largest umbrella group of American nuns.
abstract: Pope Francis reaffirms reprimand of Leadership Conference of Women Religious issued by his predecessor Pope Benedict XVI; Vatican has said group of American nuns is tinged with feminist influences and focuses too much on ending social and economic injustice and questioning church doctrine.
lead_paragraph: Pope Francis reaffirmed a plan to have three bishops supervise an overhaul of the nation’s largest umbrella group of American nuns.

headline.seo: Pope Upholds Reprimand of Nuns’ Group
headline.main: Pope Upholds Reprimand of American Nuns’ Group
headline.print_headline: Pope Upholds Reprimand Of American Nuns’ Group
